item.description:
At the end of the Day workshop we'll discuss Sarging spots for the night. The initial plan is to meet at a resaurant / bar to get in a talkative state and head out to the sarging area at 10pm. RSVP here and contact me on my cell around 6pm to get the final locations. I'll also post the destinations on this site as soon as final venues have been selected. If you have any preferences leave a comment here or a message on my cell.

Roshi cell # 203-599-1120


"Get out of your head and get in the Game."

ATTENTION!! Here is the scoop:

We're meeting up at Black Bear Saloon at 8:30 and hanging there till 10:00. We'll be bouncing to Hoola Hanks and than to the Bar at midnight.



STARTING POINT:

Black Bear Saloon
124 Temple St
New Haven, CT 06510
(203) 562-2327
www.blackbearnh.com/
item.name: Saturday Night Sarge
